meanings: riches, valuables, treasures, wealth, precious things

vlive.korean: 아니면 지금 재보든가 믿지 앞에서! - 그럴까요? Why don't we measure in front of MIDZY then? - Shall we? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ITZY] 시험 벼락치기🙅‍♀️이제 성장 벼락치기의 시대입니다🙆‍♀️ (ITZY measuring the height)
vlive.english: Why don't we measure in front of MIDZY then? - Shall we?

vlive.korean: 이건 좀 시간 재볼까? Should I count the time? 듣기 View video DAY6 : 도공공장공장장🐶🛠 Ep. 3
지금 한번 재볼까? 자 있나? Should we measure it now? Do we have a ruler? 듣기 View video SF9 : 두데
vlive.english: Should we measure it now? Do we have a ruler?

vlive.korean: 재보라고? - 너 몇 kg인데? You want me weigh myself? - How much do you weigh? 듣기 View video TWICE : ㅇ ㅇ
vlive.english: You want me weigh myself? - How much do you weigh?

vlive.korean: 아무도 안 믿어요. - 같이 재볼까요 한번? No one believes me. - Should we measure them? 듣기 View video 이달의 소녀(LOONA) : [이달의 소녀] 오빛! 얼굴 볼래?
vlive.english: No one believes me. - Should we measure them?

examples.korean: treasures of the feeling and thinking of our race 발음듣기 우리 민족의 감정과 사고(思考)의 재보<財寶>(서물<書物>). 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: treasures of the feeling and thinking of our race 발음

examples.korean: Immediately upon awakening, take your temperature. 발음듣기 깨나자마자 즉시, 여러분의 체온을 재보세요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Immediately upon awakening, take your temperature. 발음

examples.korean: Also, take your pulse after doing high level exercise. 발음듣기 또한, 높은 수준의 운동을 한 후에 여러분의 맥박을 재보세요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Also, take your pulse after doing high level exercise. 발음

examples.korean: Take your pulse again when you have finished your cooling down exercises. 발음듣기 운동을 하고 진정이 됐을 때 여러분의 맥박을 다시 재보세요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Take your pulse again when you have finished your cooling down exercises. 발음

examples.korean: If you want to see how well you are exercising, take your pulse before you start. 발음듣기 만약 여러분이 운동을 얼마나 잘 하고 있는지 알고 싶다면, 시작하기 전에 맥박을 재보세요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: If you want to see how well you are exercising, take your pulse before you start. 발음
